name: RTCRtpReceiver.getStats
description: The RTCRtpReceiver method getStats() asynchronously requests an RTCStatsReport object which provides statistics about incoming traffic on the owning RTCPeerConnection, returning a Promise whose fulfillment handler will be called once the results are available.
content: The RTCRtpReceiver method getStats() asynchronously requests an RTCStatsReport object which provides statistics about incoming traffic on the owning RTCPeerConnection, returning a Promise whose fulfillment handler will be called once the results are available.
